name: Datsara Village
address: Vohidrotra - 1ère à droite après Pont Ivoloina / 3.5km de piste, Toamasina, Madagascar
description: Datsara Village is a resort situated outside the city. There are numerous facilities such as a swimming pool, a picnic area, tennis court, baby foot, etc ... A great place to spend the week-end with family.

name: Avenue de l'indépendance
address: Avenue de l'indépendance, Boulevard Augagneur, Toamasina, Madagascar
description: Avenue de l'indépendance is a landmark in Toamasina to commemorate the day Madagascar got its independance from the French colonization

name: Foulpointe
description: Foulpointe beach is renowned for its turquoise sea water and its beautiful beach. If you want to enjoy the beach, the sunshine, and seafoods, come visit

name: Ivoloina Park
address: Villa Nathalie, Carreau 1A, Plot 14/21 Salazamay Nord, Toamasina, Madagascar
description: Discover the magic of Madagascar at Parc Ivoloina (eev’-uh-lah-ween). Observe twelve different varieties of lemurs including free-ranging species as well as an assortment of native reptiles and amphibians like our famous chameleons and tomato frogs. Take a guided tour, explore the forest on one of many walking trails, enjoy a picnic lunch, and cool off in a waterfall.

name: Jet d'eau
description: Popularly called jet d'eau locally, it is a pressurized fountain water with lights and music which is available every evening at 07pm, 08pm, and 09pm. Every show is 15mn long.

name: Miami
description: Miami is a recreation area that was inaugurated last year. There are high end restaurant, garden, recreational sport, and fitness activities.

name: Région
description: Your go to place for every administrative matter. If there are information that you need regarding the city, you can find it there.

name: Skate Park
description: Build specifically for every extreme sport enthusiast. You can roller skate, skateboard, bmx, kick scooter, etc ...
